name: Alone Together (Love_Squared)
description:
Stuck in the forest, two spirits will have to reunite and work together if they want to pass on to the other side. In this game players will work together to overcome obstacles, having to find a perfect balance without losing one's way in order to find their way back to the spirit plane. 

HOW TO PLAY:

Controller Compatible:  Install a controller of your choice, and share the individual sticks on a single controller.

Keyboard Compatible: The player that control the red ghost will use the keys: A,W,S,D. The Player that controls the blue ghost will be using the directional keys.

Love Squared Studios:

Darnesh Alleck - Lead Artist, Environmental Artist.

Jess Ammeen - Lead Designer

Matthew Hawkings - Lead Programmer

Shola John - Producer, Lead Audio Designer.
